heroItems.title: Pokemon
heroItems.discription: The Pokémon franchise is set in a world in which humans coexist with creatures known as Pokémon. The original full name of the franchise is Pocket Monsters, which has been commonly abbreviated to Pokemon since its launch

heroItems.title: Dragon ball z
heroItems.discription: Dragon Ball Z picks up five years after the end of the Dragon Ball series, with Son Goku now a young adult and father to his son, Gohan.

heroItems.title: One Piece
heroItems.discription: The world of One Piece is populated by humans and other races such as dwarves (more akin to faeries in size), giants, merfolk, fish-men, long-limbed tribes, long-necked people known as the Snakeneck Tribe, and animal people known as Minks.
